00058 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_DB extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractFinisher {
00059         
00066         protected $table;
00067         
00074         protected $key;
00075         
00082         protected $doUpdate;
00083         
00090         protected $settings;
00091         
00097         protected $cObj;
00098         
00106         public function process($gp,$settings) {
00107                 
00108                 //set GET/POST parameters
00109                 $this->gp = $gp;
00110                 
00111                 //set settings
00112                 $this->settings = $settings;
00113                 
00114                 //initialize
00115                 $this->init();
00116                 
00117                 //set fields to insert/update
00118                 $queryFields = $this->parseFields();
00119                 $queryFields = $this->escapeFields($queryFields,$this->table);
00120                 
00121                 //query the database
00122                 $this->save($queryFields);
00123                 
00124                 return $this->gp;
00125         }
00126         
00134         protected function escapeFields($queryFields,$table) {
00135                 return $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->fullQuoteArray($queryFields,$table);
00136         }
00137         
00144         protected function save(&$queryFields) {
00145                 
00146                 //insert query
00147                 if(!$this->doUpdate) {
00148                         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_INSERTquery($this->table,$queryFields);
00149                         
00150                 //update query
00151                 } else {
00152                         
00153                         //check if uid of record to update is in GP
00154                         $uid =$this->gp['uid'];
00155                         if(!$uid) {
00156                                 $uid = $this->gp[$this->key];
00157                         }
00158                         if($uid) {
00159                                 $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_UPDATEquery($this->table,$this->key."=".$uid,$queryFields);
00160                         } else {
00161                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("UID parameter not found in GP. Cannot make update!");
00162                         }
00163                 }
00164         }
00165         
00171         protected function init() {
00172                 
00173                 //make cObj instance
00174                 $this->cObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tslib_cObj');
00175                 $this->cObj->setCurrentVal($GLOBALS['TSFE']->id);
00176                 
00177                 //set table
00178                 $this->table = $this->settings['table'];
00179                 if(!$this->table || !is_array($this->settings['fields.'])) {
00180                         throw new Exception("No table configured!");
00181                         return;
00182                 }
00183                 
00184                 //set primary key field
00185                 $this->key = $this->settings['key'];
00186                 if(!$this->key) {
00187                         $this->key = "uid"; 
00188                 }
00189                 
00190                 //check whether to update or to insert a record
00191                 $this->doUpdate = false;
00192                 if($this->settings['updateInsteadOfInsert']) {
00193                         $this->doUpdate = true;
00194                 }
00195         }
00196         
00202         protected function parseFields() {
00203                 $queryFields = array();
00204                 
00205                 //parse mapping
00206                 foreach($this->settings['fields.'] as $fieldname=>$options) {
00207                         $fieldname = str_replace(".","",$fieldname);
00208                         
00209                         if(isset($options) && is_array($options) && !isset($options['special'])) {
00210                         
00211                                 //if no mapping default to the name of the form field
00212                                 if(!$options['mapping']) {
00213                                         $options['mapping'] = $fieldname;
00214                                 }
00215                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = $this->gp[$options['mapping']];
00216                                 
00217                                 //process empty value handling
00218                                 if($options['ifIsEmpty'] && strlen($this->gp[$options['mapping']]) == 0) {
00219                                         
00220                                         //if given settings is a TypoScript object
00221                                         if(isset($options['if_is_empty.']) && is_array($options['if_is_empty.'])) {
00222                                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($options['ifIsEmpty'],$options['ifIsEmpty.']);
00223                                         } else {
00224                                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = $options['ifIsEmpty'];
00225                                         }
00226                                 }
00227                                 
00228                                 //process array handling
00229                                 if(isset($this->gp[$options['mapping']]) && is_array($this->gp[$options['mapping']])) {
00230                                         $seperator = ",";
00231                                         if($options['seperator']) {
00232                                                 $seperator = $options['seperator'];
00233                                         }
00234                                         $queryFields[$fieldname] = implode($seperator,$this->gp[$options['mapping']]);
00235                                 }
00236                                 
00237                         //special mapping
00238                         } elseif(isset($options) && is_array($options) && isset($options['special'])) {
00239                                 switch($options['special']) {
00240                                         case "sub_datetime":
00241                                                 $now = date("Y-m-d H:i:s", time());
00242                                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = $now;
00243                                         break;
00244                                         case "sub_tstamp":
00245                                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = time();
00246                                         break;
00247                                         case "ip":
00248                                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REMOTE_ADDR');
00249                                         break;
00250                                 }
00251                         } else {
00252                                 $queryFields[$fieldname] = $options;
00253                         }
00254                 }
00255                 return $queryFields;
00256         }
00257         
00258 }
